DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety profile specific immunotherapy Grazax three consecutive grass pollen season .
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability Grazax Patients With Hayfever Real Life Settings
DOC.detailed_description: To assess safety profile Grazax accord presence polysensitization and/or asthma enrollment
DOC.criteria: History grass pollen allergy Positive skin pricktest and/or positive specific IgE grass Severe , unstable uncontrolled asthma ( FEV1 < 70 % predict value )
